text: @marklevinshow So Obama took a drug to combat a disease where he traveled? What's the point @marklevinshow? Or do u think ur listeners/readers r that dumb to think Obama took a trip where he needed to watch out for malaria w/ not a Dr #Trump suggesting its use for #COVID19 along with bleach?
